鏟.definition: to scrape the ground with a spade (to make it level or to remove weeds); to shovel (variant of 剷|铲[chan3]); (bound form) spade; shovel

鏟子.definition: shovel; spade; trowel; spatula (kitchen utensil); CL:把[ba3]

鏟屎官.definition: (neologism) (coll.) pet owner (lit. "official in charge of cleaning up poop")

鏟蹚.definition: to hoe; to weed (between crop rows)
